name: Catch 22
description:
2022 Reset64 4KB Craptastic Game Competition entry.

The object of the game is to catch 22 instances of the number "22" from a maze in Numberland.  Yes, I know. Lame!

You have 222 moves to find them all, but the 'catch' is you can't go back where you have walked.

Controls: Joystick Port 2.
